title: B2B SaaS PLG Framework
description: Product-led growth template for B2B SaaS companies with freemium model, tracking the complete user journey from discovery to advocacy

milestones.title: Website Visit
milestones.description: User lands on marketing website or product page

milestones.title: Value Proposition Understanding
milestones.description: User explores features, pricing, and use cases

milestones.title: Sign-Up Intent
milestones.description: User clicks on CTA to start free trial or sign up

milestones.title: Account Created
milestones.description: User completes registration and creates account

metrics.name: Website Conversion Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of website visitors who sign up for an account

metrics.name: Sign-Up Funnel Drop-off
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users who start but don't complete sign-up

metrics.name: Time to Sign-Up
metrics.howToMeasure: Average time from landing page to account creation

metrics.name: Traffic Source Quality
metrics.howToMeasure: Conversion rate by traffic source (organic, paid, referral)

milestones.title: Welcome & Onboarding Start
milestones.description: User sees welcome message and onboarding flow begins

milestones.title: Profile Setup
milestones.description: User completes basic profile and workspace configuration

milestones.title: First Core Action
milestones.description: User completes primary product action (e.g., creates first project, sends first message)

milestones.title: Aha Moment
milestones.description: User experiences core value proposition and sees tangible results

milestones.title: Feature Discovery
milestones.description: User explores additional features beyond the core action

metrics.name: Activation Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of new users who complete aha moment within 7 days

metrics.name: Time to Value (TTV)
metrics.howToMeasure: Average time from sign-up to completing first core action

metrics.name: Onboarding Completion Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users who complete all onboarding steps

metrics.name: Day-1 Retention
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users who return within 24 hours of sign-up

milestones.title: Second Session
milestones.description: User returns to the product within 48 hours

milestones.title: Regular Usage Pattern
milestones.description: User establishes a usage frequency (daily, weekly)

milestones.title: Feature Adoption
milestones.description: User adopts 3+ features beyond core functionality

milestones.title: Workspace Growth
milestones.description: User invites team members or creates multiple projects

milestones.title: Power User Actions
milestones.description: User leverages advanced features and shortcuts

metrics.name: Weekly Active Users (WAU)
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users who engage with product at least once per week

metrics.name: Session Frequency
metrics.howToMeasure: Average number of sessions per user per week

metrics.name: Feature Adoption Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Average number of features used per active user

metrics.name: Engagement Score
metrics.howToMeasure: Composite score based on frequency, depth, and breadth of usage

milestones.title: Week 2 Return
milestones.description: User is still active after initial engagement period

milestones.title: Month 1 Milestone
milestones.description: User remains active for 30 days

milestones.title: Data/Content Investment
milestones.description: User has significant data/content stored in the platform

milestones.title: Integration Usage
milestones.description: User connects product with other tools in their workflow

milestones.title: Long-term User
milestones.description: User remains active for 90+ days

metrics.name: 30-Day Retention
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users still active 30 days after activation

metrics.name: 90-Day Retention
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users still active 90 days after activation

metrics.name: Churn Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users who stop using product each month

metrics.name: Resurrection Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of churned users who return to active usage

milestones.title: Paywall Encounter
milestones.description: User hits a free plan limit or restriction

milestones.title: Upgrade Consideration
milestones.description: User views pricing page or upgrade prompts

milestones.title: Trial Conversion
milestones.description: User enters payment information and starts paid plan

milestones.title: First Renewal
milestones.description: User successfully renews subscription after first billing cycle

milestones.title: Plan Upgrade
milestones.description: User upgrades to higher tier or adds seats/features

metrics.name: Free-to-Paid Conversion
metrics.howToMeasure: % of free users who convert to paid plans

metrics.name: Time to Conversion
metrics.howToMeasure: Average days from sign-up to first payment

metrics.name: Average Revenue Per User (ARPU)
metrics.howToMeasure: Total revenue / total active users

metrics.name: Net Revenue Retention
metrics.howToMeasure: (Revenue from existing customers - churn + expansion) / starting revenue

metrics.name: Expansion Revenue
metrics.howToMeasure: % of revenue from upsells and upgrades

milestones.title: First Share Action
milestones.description: User shares content, invites team member, or refers friend

milestones.title: Referral Link Generated
milestones.description: User creates and shares referral link

milestones.title: Referral Sign-Up
milestones.description: A referred user creates an account

milestones.title: Referral Activation
milestones.description: Referred user reaches activation milestone

milestones.title: Advocate Status
milestones.description: User generates 5+ successful referrals

metrics.name: Viral Coefficient (K-Factor)
metrics.howToMeasure: (Invites per user) Ã— (Conversion rate of invites)

metrics.name: Referral Conversion Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of referral clicks that result in sign-ups

metrics.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
metrics.howToMeasure: % promoters - % detractors (survey-based)

metrics.name: Share Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of users who share or invite at least once

metadata.framework_description: A comprehensive PLG framework based on AARRR (Acquisition, Activation, Engagement, Retention, Revenue, Referral) with detailed milestones and metrics for B2B SaaS
metadata.usage: Use this template to track and optimize your product-led growth funnel, focusing on user journey stages and key performance indicators
